name: Meka Grappler X
description:
Note: this is a Sega Genesis / Mega Drive game.

Grab enemies with your spaceship's hook and throw them at each other in this little but fun game! Play solo to see how long you last, or get help from a friend while also competing to get the highest score!

  • 1 or 2 players
  • Seven different maps
  • Saved high score list (optional)

Get source code here: https://github.com/sikthehedgehog/meka
